pros: Flexible working hours. Sufficient medical insurance
cons: High workload and extensive administrative task

review_title: Great organisation fighting for gender equality and and climate change
pros: Oxfam is a great organisation to work if you are passionate about gender and climate issues and fighting poverty
cons: It's an old organisation, making it rigid at times. Does not pay its local staff well compared to its international staff.

pros: understand good management according to international standards
cons: nothing bad, because I was very impressed with the management of this organization
